sections.heading: Overview
content:
The author of the widely acclaimed books Raising a Handicapped
Child and Raising a Child With a Neuromuscular Disorder ,
Charlotte E. Thompson, MD, is director of the Center for Handicapped Children
and Teenagers in San Francisco and an assistant clinical professor of
pediatrics at the University of California at San Diego. She is a fellow of the
American Academy of Pediatrics.
